Title: Relates to creating a cyber security enhancement fund and restricting the use of taxpayer moneys in paying ransoms
Summary: Creates a cyber security enhancement fund to be used for the purpose of upgrading cyber security in local governments, including but not limited to, villages, towns and cities with a population of one million or less; restricts the use of taxpayer moneys in paying ransoms in response to ransomware attacks.
